Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Iliac Branch Devices in Aortoiliac Aneurysm Repair

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to assess pre-endovascular repair anatomical characteristics in patients from the Global Iliac Branch Study (GIBS, NCT05607277) to enhance selection criteria for iliac branch devices (IBD) and improve long-term outcomes.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Left total iliac artery length was shorter than right (6.7 mm, P = 0.0019); right common iliac artery less tortuous (P = 0.0145). Males exhibited greater tortuosity in the left total iliac artery (P = 0.0475) and larger diameter in left internal iliac artery's landing zone (P = 0.0453).
